name: This is a Legitimately game
description:
This game is for my YouTube friend, Legitimately, for a Christmas present

His Channel: LegItimatly - YouTube

This is absolutely garbage and it's my very very first game so please don't expect much at all

This game was made in 3 days

Controls: 

Arrow keys to move

Click to shoot

This game could probably be finished in like 5 minutes or so...

Engine that was used: Construct 3 (Free Edition)
